## NonSanitizedArray type

A virtually unlimitedly nested array of values, including void and non-void ones

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type NonSanitizedArray<T = any> = RecursiveArray<T | null | undefined>;
```
<b>References:</b> [RecursiveArray](./kassette.recursivearray.md)
